A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rain Johnson obviously does not like Star Wars\, and also hates men - particularly white men.  This entire movie is infected with SJW hate speech and is basically just a vehicle for demeaning and marginalizing white males.  Luke is turned from one of the greatest characters in movie history into a worthless loser.  Rey is the ultimate Mary-Sue\, so much so that is makes a complete mockery of all the Star Wars movies before it.  The plot holes in this movie are inexcusable\, as well as the complete waste of 35 minutes of runtime on a preachy SJW leftist soap-box side-plot that literally nobody enjoyed.  Just an awful movie\, and a disgrace to this movie franchise.
